title: slumberjack
author: slumberjack
content: BTCitcoin Cartoons!! Bitcoin Talk'ers,I'm proud to announce my website launch at https://www.bitcoincartoons.io/All available toons can be found on display in the Shop. Find me on Twitter @ https://twitter.com/BitcoinCartoonsEach Cartoon comes with a signed Certificate of Authenticity. Free Shipping to USA. BTC receiving address will be shared via Direct Messages. DM me here or on twitter if you like one you see!

comments.author: slumberjack
comments.body: Quote from: Eclipse33 on June 13, 2022, 07:15:43 PMThese are super advanced and rather talented. Thanks for the kind words, Eclipse! I'd like to thank the past 13 years for a never ending supply of bitcoin memes, jokes, and references.
